title.rendered: Transaction Categorization: A Guide for Businesses and Individuals

content.rendered:
Transaction categorization is the process of assigning transactions to specific categories based on their nature and purpose. It is a crucial aspect of financial management, enabling individuals and businesses to organize their financial data effectively and gain insights into their income, expenses, assets, and liabilities.

Proper transaction categorization is essential for several reasons:

  1. It provides a clear overview of where money is being spent and earned, allowing for better budgeting and financial planning.
  2. It simplifies tax preparation by separating deductible expenses from non-deductible ones.
  3. It helps identify areas for cost optimization and potential savings.
  4. It enables accurate financial reporting and decision-making based on reliable data.

However, categorizing transactions can be a challenging task, especially for businesses and individuals with a large volume of transactions or complex financial operations.

II. Common Transaction Categories

While transaction categories may vary depending on the specific needs and industry, here are some common categories used by most businesses and individuals:

  1. Income
    • Wages/Salaries
    • Sales Revenue
    • Investment Income
    • Rental Income
    • Royalties
    • Miscellaneous Income
  2. Expenses
    • Operating Costs
    • Supplies
    • Utilities
    • Advertising and Marketing
    • Travel
    • Professional Services
    • Rent/Mortgage
    • Insurance
    • Taxes
    • Interest Payments
  3. Assets
    • Cash and Cash Equivalents
    • Investments (Stocks, Bonds, Cryptocurrencies)
    • Property (Real Estate, Vehicles)
    • Equipment and Machinery
    • Inventory
  4. Liabilities
    • Loans (Personal, Business, Mortgages)
    • Credit Card Balances
    • Accounts Payable
    • Taxes Payable
  5. Transfers
    • Between Accounts (Checking, Savings, Investment)
    • Reimbursements
    • Refunds

III. Best Practices for Categorizing Transactions

To ensure accurate and consistent transaction categorization, it’s essential to follow best practices:

  1. Set up a comprehensive category structure: Establish a well-defined set of categories that covers all types of transactions relevant to your business or personal finances. This structure should be easy to understand and navigate.
  2. Apply category rules consistently: Develop clear guidelines for assigning transactions to specific categories, and ensure that these rules are consistently applied across all transactions.
  3. Handle ambiguous or uncategorized transactions: Implement a process for handling transactions that cannot be easily categorized or require additional review. This may involve manual review, additional research, or creating new categories as needed.
  4. Regularly review and update categories: Periodically review your category structure and make adjustments as your financial situation or business operations evolve. This will ensure that your categories remain relevant and accurate.

IV. Tools and Techniques for Transaction Categorization

Several tools and techniques are available to assist with transaction categorization:

  1. Manual categorization
    • Spreadsheets (e.g., Microsoft Excel, Google Sheets)
    • Accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Xero, FreshBooks)
  2. Automated categorization
    • Machine learning algorithms
    • Rules-based systems
    • FOCAL AI-powered transaction categorization solution
  3. Transaction Categorization provides an AI-driven platform specifically designed to automate the categorization of financial transactions. It uses machine learning models trained on large datasets to accurately categorize transactions from bank/credit card consolidation feeds. The solution can integrate with accounting software and ERPs to streamline categorization workflows.
  4. Integration with accounting systems and bank feeds: Many accounting software and financial management tools offer direct integration with bank feeds, enabling automatic import and categorization of transactions.
  5. Mobile apps and categorization on-the-go: Several mobile apps allow users to categorize transactions as they occur, making it easier to stay on top of their finances.

V. Benefits of Accurate Transaction Categorization

Implementing effective transaction categorization practices can provide numerous benefits for businesses and individuals:

  1. Improved financial visibility and reporting: Categorized transactions enable accurate and detailed financial reporting, providing insights into income, expenses, assets, liquid assets, and liabilities.
  2. Easier tax preparation and compliance: Properly categorized transactions simplify the process of identifying deductible expenses and accurately reporting income, helping ensure tax compliance.
  3. Better budget tracking and expense management: By categorizing transactions, you can easily track your spending patterns, identify areas for cost optimization, and manage your budget more effectively.
  4. Identification of cost-saving opportunities: Detailed transaction categorization can reveal areas where costs can be reduced or expenses can be better managed, leading to potential cost savings. It is one of the best expense management processes.
  5. Enhanced decision-making with accurate data: With accurate and well-categorized financial data, businesses and individuals can make better-informed decisions regarding investments, resource allocation, and financial planning.

VI. Common Challenges and How to Overcome Them

While transaction categorization offers numerous benefits, it can also present several challenges:

  1. Dealing with large volumes of transactions: Manually categorizing a significant number of transactions can be time-consuming and prone to errors. Automated categorization tools and integration with accounting systems can help streamline the process.
  2. Categorizing complex or unusual transactions: Some transactions may not fit neatly into predefined categories, requiring additional research or the creation of new categories. Implementing a process for handling ambiguous transactions can help address this challenge.
  3. Maintaining category consistency across multiple users: In businesses with multiple employees categorizing transactions, ensuring consistent application of category rules is crucial. Clear guidelines, regular training, and periodic audits can help maintain consistency.
  4. Integrating categorization with existing systems and processes: Incorporating transaction categorization into existing financial management systems and processes can be challenging. Working with experienced professionals or using integrated solutions can facilitate a smoother transition.

VII. Future Trends in Transaction Categorization

As technology continues to evolve, several trends are shaping the future of transaction categorization:

  1. Advancements in machine learning and AI: Ongoing improvements in machine learning algorithms and artificial intelligence will enhance the accuracy and efficiency of automated transaction categorization.
  2. Increased adoption of open banking and data sharing: With the rise of open banking and data sharing initiatives, businesses and individuals will have easier access to comprehensive financial data, enabling more comprehensive and accurate categorization.
  3. Integration with other technologies: Transaction categorization is likely to integrate with other emerging technologies, such as blockchain for secure and transparent record-keeping, and the Internet of Things (IoT) for capturing real-time transaction data from connected devices.
  4. Impact of new payment methods and financial innovations: The emergence of new payment methods, such as cryptocurrencies and mobile wallets, may require adjustments to transaction categorization frameworks to accommodate these innovative financial instruments.

VIII. Conclusion

Transaction categorization is a crucial aspect of financial management, enabling businesses and individuals to organize their financial data, gain insights into their income and expenses, and make informed decisions. By following best practices, leveraging appropriate tools and techniques, and staying up-to-date with emerging trends, organizations can implement effective transaction categorization processes, leading to improved financial visibility, compliance, and overall financial health.

Whether you’re a small business owner, a large corporation, or an individual managing personal finances, incorporating transaction categorization into your financial management practices is a step towards better financial control and decision-making. Implement the strategies and solutions outlined in this guide to unlock the full potential of transaction categorization for your organization.

title.rendered: What are the core principles of lead management?

content.rendered:
Lead generation management refers to acquiring, nurturing, and converting leads for the purpose of expansion and growth of the business. Marketing experts suggest new trends in lead management regularly. Businesses try to inculcate such trends and ideas to up their lead acquisition. With the objective of attracting and converting more leads, businesses keep on changing their lead acquisition strategies. 

Beat the Competition

There’s stiff competition in the industry. Marketers try to beat the competition through unique and creative lead acquisition concepts. Businesses wish to bag in more leads through effective and efficient ideas. Some even resort to herd mentality, aping lead acquisition ideas of the competitors. However, this does not guarantee results as every business is unique. What works for one, may or may not work for the other. 

Slow and Steady Process

Lead generation initiatives do not require some magical words or chants to make them successful. It is not a quick and simple process that gives instant results. Lead nurturing is a slow and steady process that needs to be continued even when the company is doing well. This helps companies tap the potential market in the future when the market is going through a slack.

Testing and Development

It is necessary that businesses inculcate the habit of testing new ideas for lead generation methods. This helps them understand the ideas that work and those that do not give good results. As a result, there would always be a bunch of lead acquisition ideas with the business that will help them during times when the present ones are not working. Staying updated with the latest tech news can provide valuable insights and innovative strategies to explore new avenues for lead generation and stay ahead of the competition.

Lead Management Software

Start-ups should take the help of efficient lead management software. The software is founded on the basis of core principles helping businesses to acquire, nurture, and manage leads in the most effective manner. It even helps companies create invoices and quotations to make a great impression on customers. Lead management software unburdens the decision-makers, allowing them to focus their energies on strategies. In case you are unable to find all the unique features you need in an off-the-shelf solution, you can also hire developers to create custom lead management software. 

Principles of Lead Management

Every organization has its own set of lead-generation ideas and methods. While the lead generation methods keep on changing with the times and market conditions, lead management principles remain the same. These lead management principles have remained the same for quite some time. They have stood like a rock, helping companies acquire leads all around the year. These principles always deliver results as they are universally accepted and focus on acquiring customers. Here are some core principles of lead management:- 

#1 Understand your leads 

The primary and most basic lead management principle is to understand the leads and the potential customers. It is necessary to comprehend the background, behaviors, and decision-making of the potential customers in order to tap them. It is necessary for companies to understand what are the motivating factors in the buying behavior of the customers. When the marketers understand the concerns and satisfaction factors of the leads, then tapping them becomes a cakewalk. 

#2 Meet the leads where they are 

The number of marketing channels has shot up in recent years. Marketers need to tap those channels effectively where their potential customers are present. There is a number of marketing tools available. For instance, if it is a youth brand, then newspapers will not work for it. It is necessary to be present on social media channels to tap the youth. Every customer who interacts with the brand is considered to be a leader. It is necessary that companies chart out a communication plan using the right tools at every touchpoint where the company can meet the leads. 

#3 Empathise with the Leads

An old admonition says to walk a mile in someone else’s shoes to understand them. When marketers understand the pain points of potential customers, they are able to offer the right solutions. Comprehend the driving factors of the leads, the reasons they buy a particular product, and why they stick to a brand. This helps in making decisions in advance on the lead management process. 

#4 Address leads with the right communication

Gone are the days when advertising about the product would work to tap the customers. People now wish to hear about the ideas that offer them the right solutions to the issues they face. When marketers go out of their way to empower potential customers with the knowledge and resources that help them, they are able to build high brand recall. Charting out the best sales presentation and effective content marketing plan helps in planning an effective lead management strategy. 

#5 Add extra value to offerings

People look for the ‘extra’ benefits they will receive when they buy a product or service. Companies need to register their brands in the minds of potential customers by offering value-added services with the products. This helps brands get high recall during the decision-making process. 

#6 Categorise the leads

Marketers need to categorize the leads based on their buying patterns, background, needs, and other decisive factors. Proper segmentation of the leads is very crucial for converting them into customers. It is necessary that brands learn to recognize the type of leads that help bring business. This will assist marketers in understanding whether a lead is worth the time, effort, and money or not. 

#7 Plan an experiential customer journey for the leads

After the segmentation of the leads, the next step is to be aware of the steps that every lead takes throughout the buying process. It pays when marketers track the interactions of the leads, right from the point when the customer gets in touch with the brand to the time he/she is satisfied with the experience. Map the entire purchase path and insist on planning this path well in advance. This helps offer a positive experiential journey to customers.  

#8 Invest in Customer Relationship Management (CRM)

Marketers need proper tools for collecting and analyzing relevant information regarding the leads. An effective customer relationship management system is one that helps solve problems by gathering data and analyzing it for insights. Investing in a new-age CRM tool helps store every interaction, every issue that is reported, and even document processes that are related to the leads. This helps avoid problems later in the process.

Summary

Without any doubt, some of these lead management principles would already be present in your marketing strategy. There would be some you still have not thought of like investing in a startup CRM tool. It is time that you plan a fool-prof lead management plan for generating great results.

title.rendered: The Best Digital Marketing Tools For Freelancers

content.rendered:
Marketing is hard. It’s even harder when you’re a freelancer and have to do it all yourself. But don’t worry, we’ve got you covered. In this blog post, we will go over the best digital marketing tools for freelancers. From social media management to website building and more, these tools will help you save time and money while still getting the job done right. So if you’re ready to take your freelance business to the next level, read on for the best digital marketing tools for freelancers.

The Benefits of Digital Marketing

Digital marketing has a lot of advantages for freelancers. It is relatively inexpensive, so you can save money on marketing costs. You can also reach a larger audience with digital marketing than you could with traditional marketing methods.

Digital marketing tools can help you manage your marketing agency project management tool more effectively. You can use tools to track your progress, measure results, and make changes as needed.

Digital marketing tools allow you to track your results so you can see how effective your marketing campaigns are. This is important for any business, but it is especially important for freelancers who need to be able to show potential clients that they are getting results from their investment.

There are a number of different digital marketing tools available, so you can choose the ones that best fit your needs. Some of the most popular tools include social media marketing, search engine optimization, and email marketing.

The Different Types of Digital Marketing Tools

There are a variety of digital marketing tools available to freelancers, and the best tool for any given freelancer will vary depending on their needs and goals. Some common digital marketing tools used by freelancers include:

Email marketing: Email marketing can be a great way to stay in touch with past and potential clients, and to promote your services to a wider audience. There are a number of email marketing platforms available, such as Mailchimp, Constant Contact, and AWeber.

Social media: Social media can be a great way to connect with potential clients and build your brand. Platforms like Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn offer opportunities to share your work, engage with others in your field, and build relationships.

Content marketing: Content marketing is all about creating valuable content that will help you attract attention and build trust with potential clients. This could include blogging, creating infographics, or developing helpful how-to guides.

SEO: Search engine optimization can help you make sure your website and online content are easy to find when people search for relevant keywords. This includes optimizing your website for Google search as well as other directories and social media sites.

Paid advertising: Paid advertising can be a great way to reach a larger audience with your message. Platforms like Google AdWords and Facebook Ads allow you to target specific demographics, interests, or even locations with your ads.

The Best Digital Marketing Tools for Freelancers

As a freelancer, you know the importance of marketing yourself and your business. But with so many digital marketing tools out there, it can be tough to know which ones to use.

Here are some of the best digital marketing tools for freelancers:

  1. Social media: This is a great way to connect with potential clients and promote your services. Make sure you have a strong presence on popular platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook.
  2. Content marketing: A blog is a great way to show off your expertise and attract new clients. Focus on creating high-quality content that will help you stand out from the competition.
  3. Email marketing: This is an effective way to keep in touch with past clients and promote your services to potential new ones. Make sure you have a professional-looking email list and send out regular newsletters or updates.
  4. Search engine optimization: This helps ensure that your website appears as high up as possible in search results, making it more likely that people will find you when they’re looking for what you offer.  By using SaaS SEO tools to help you optimize your website for search engines. By using the right keywords and phrases, you can ensure that your website appears at the top of search engine results pages (SERPs), which will help you attract more visitors and clients.
  5. Pay-per-click advertising: This can be a great way to get your name and website in front of potential customers who are already interested in what you do.
  6. Networking: Attend relevant events and meetups, or join online communities related to your industry. This is a great way to make connections and build relationships that could lead to new business.

How to Use Digital Marketing Tools

As a freelancer, you have a lot of freedom when it comes to choosing the digital marketing tools that you use. However, with so many options available, it can be tricky to know which ones are the best for your business.

To help you out, we’ve put together a list of the best digital marketing tools for freelancers. Whether you’re looking for ways to improve your website traffic or want to find new clients, these tools will help you get the job done.

  1. WordPress – It is one of the most popular site-building and content management systems in the world. It’s easy to use and has a ton of features that make it ideal for freelance businesses. Plus, there are thousands of plugins and themes available, so you can customize your site to fit your brand.
  2. Hootsuite – It is a social media management platform that lets you schedule posts, track analytics, and more. It’s great for busy freelancers who need to save time on social media tasks. With Hootsuite, you can post updates to all of your accounts in one place and see how your audience is responding.
  3. Canva – It is an online design platform that’s perfect for creating professional-looking graphics for your website or social media accounts. With Canva, you can create custom designs using templates or start from scratch with their
  4. Clientvenue – It is a great tool for freelancers who want to stay organized and on top of their projects. It’s easy to use and very versatile, making it a great tool for managing any type of project.

Conclusion

There are a lot of digital marketing tools out there, but not all of them are created equal. As a freelancer, you need to be able to find the best tools that will help you save time and energy while still getting great results. The ten tools on this list are some of the best that I’ve found and I’m sure they’ll be able to help you with your freelance business. Do you have any other favorite digital marketing tools? Share them with us in the comments below!

title.rendered: Effective SEO Tips for WordPress Websites to Improve Search Ranking

content.rendered:
Search engine optimization is very important for any website, including ones made on WordPress. A common misconception is that WP sites don’t need search engine optimization to improve their ranking position, but this is not true.

Your WordPress site can beat its competitors if you focus on basic optimization strategies.

Here in this post, we have discussed the most popular SEO tips that can help your WP sites get on the top search results. There are many SEO strategies that you can find online suggested by experts, but the ones we have discussed in this post are simple, effective, and best for even a new website.

7 Quick WordPress Search Engine Optimization Tips for Everyone!

Let’s get on with the WordPress SEO Tips one by one:

1.    Install and Use SEO-Friendly WordPress Theme

WordPress sites are built on predesigned and pre-optimized templates. So your priority should be to choose a template that is already optimized according to the requirements of the search engine.

There are free themes available on WordPress from which you can choose any you want. But the best thing is to choose the ones which would boost the performance of your site instead of bringing it down.

You might find some templates that would be visually interesting for you but would have scripts and plugins which are not typically used, and they can make your site slow and heavy. So it is important that you pick an SEO-friendly theme after reading reviews and ratings. If you still can’t figure out what is the best template that boosts customer interaction and presents your brand objectives in the best way possible, then let experienced WordPress development agencies do the job for you.

2.    Check & Improve Your WordPress Site Speed

Site speed matters a lot because people would not engage with a website that takes more than three to four seconds to load. In case a site takes longer to load, then it would increase its bounce rate, which is not a major bad SEO indicator.

Moreover, Google penalizes a slow website which is why you should always regularly check the loading time of your site. You can use online website speed checker tools for this purpose.

you can use Google Analytics to find out the elements which are making your site slow. Removing those elements and fixing those bugs on priority is extremely important. You can also consult a good SEO agency and get your bugs fixed immediately

3.    Delete or Rephrase Duplicate & Thin Content

Duplicate content is one that has been plagiarized from another website indexed on Google. Duplicate content isn’t only bad for SEO and kills your domain’s authority. You need to check your content via a plagiarism checker before publishing it online.

This content is the type of content that is under 300 words and is not valuable or informative to the reader. Having this kind of content on your WP site can also damage your SEO score. It is best that you remove or update the word count and quality of thin content.

If you find removing duplicate content difficult, then you can take help from an online rephrasing tool. An online paraphraser like Rephraser.co is quite useful for optimizing the content on a WP site.

You just have to enter the duplicate content as input in the rephrasing tool and click on the ‘Paraphrase’ button. In a matter of seconds, the content would be restated in a unique way. You can easily create unique and reader-friendly content with the help of an online paraphraser.

As for thin content, it is best that you use an AI content generator tool and get more information that can be added to the current draft.

  1. Ensure All Images Are Unique & Have Alt Text with Them

You would be surprised to know that more than 10% of search traffic in Google comes from Google image search and so it would be a really bad idea not to add unique images on your WP site.

It is important that you get original images for your site and the content on it, but if you are unable to create original visuals, then the least you need to do is use a commercially licensed image.

By adding alt text to your website images, you can easily drive more traffic and improve your SEO score. Adding alt text is not at all difficult, and you can easily do it while setting the format on the dashboard of your WP site.

Alt text is an important element as it tells Google about the topic of a specific webpage. So you can easily mention alt text in context with the content on the web page.

  1. Write a Unique and Compelling Meta Title and Description 

Metadata isn’t a ranking factor, but it is surely important for SEO, as Google considers it while creating search result snippets. It is very important that you create interesting meta titles and descriptions that can entice people to click and lead to your website.

You must try to use keywords in the metadata so that Google can index it under relevant search queries. We would also suggest you use an active voice while writing metadata and keep them under the given character limit.

The ideal character limit for a meta title is 50, and for a description, it is 130. You can use an online character counter while writing metadata.

  1. Try to Structure Your Content to Create a Hierarchy 

Headers and subheadings are very important as they help you build a proper structure for your content. Know that the structure of content plays an important role in engaging the target audience and so it can also boost your SEO score.

The purpose of heading tags is to give readers a clear idea about what kind of content they are going to find on the website. WordPress allows you to add automated heading tags which is why you should always use them. Using keywords in headers is also beneficial in terms of SEO.

  1. Get internal & Backlinks for Content On Your WP Site

Backlinks and internal links are very important. First, know that backlinks are the links that point traffic from other sites to yours. Internal links are the ones that point/direct traffic from one page of your site to another one.

Generating backlinks with sites that are relevant to your niche and have higher SERPs can help you a lot in boosting your SEO score and winning a good position in the search results in a very short time.

The purpose of internal links is to keep a visitor on your site for as long as possible. The more the engagement rate of your site would be, the better your SEO score.

Having internal links also helps you boost the authority of content on which the user engages the most. With WordPress, you can easily add links using the WYSIWYG editor plugin!

Final Thoughts 

WordPress is no doubt an easy-to-use and friendly platform for building new websites. But know that you have to put in SEO efforts manually because, at the end of the day, it is more of a content management system. So if you are serious about taking your WP site to the top, then follow these tips and tricks!

title.rendered: How to Pin a Comment & Post on Instagram [Step-by-Step-Guide]

content.rendered:
Instagram is such an amazing platform it not only lets you communicate with a new audience and enhances your engagement. You can have control of your account, it takes care of its users. If you feel that some people are not giving a positive response to your posts. You can simply block them from your profile or block them from commenting on your posts. You can even block the whole comment section for users, this will not let them post any comments on your content.

If you feel like any comment is important and you want to highlight it for other users, you can pin it in your comment section. This will remain at the top of comments and other users will see this comment first rather than other comments. Even if you are facing a sticky problem that is related to cyberbullying, you can pin it to avoid trolls. Instagram is an amazing platform and you need to encourage positivity on it. You can pin up to three comments in your comment section. Not only a single but all three of them will show at the top in your comment section. We’ll let you know why this feature is important especially if you are an influencer or celebrity. You need to learn how you can pin a comment and post it on Instagram.

How to Pin a Comment on Instagram Post?

Pinning a comment on your Instagram post is not a difficult process, you just need to follow easy steps and you’ll be able to do it without any extra effort. But you need to keep a few points in mind:

  •         You wouldn’t be able to pin your comment
  •         Your phone should be updated to the latest version
  •         you cannot pin replies to any comment

Hope these points will clear that you may encounter these issues while pining your comment, so don’t need to worry. Also, follow these below steps to pin a comment on your Instagram post:

–          Go to your Instagram account.

–          Click on any of your posts

–          Swipe on any comment that you want to show on top

–          You’ll get to see four options

–          Click on the option with a thumbtack

–          Pin the comment you want to show at the top

–          You can repeat these same steps with 2 more comments

–          You can pin 3 comments on a post

How to Pin a Comment on Instagram Live

Instagram live is the best way to directly communicate with your followers and it’s mostly used by celebrities and influencers. Some even buy Instagram likes to engage their feed or increase engagement rate. They use Instagram live to directly interact with their followers or to have fun with each other.

  •         Instagram Live allows you to pin comments at the top during your live session.
  •         It depends on your region and whether you can pin your comment on your live session or not.

Here is the easy method through which you can pin any comment during your live session:

–          Open your Instagram account

–          Go to settings

–          From there select live to start your live session

–          Similarly like on the post, swipe left on comments that are added by others or by you.

–          Click on Pin Comment

–          You are done

How to Pin a Comment on Instagram Story?

That’s a fact Instagram stories are used the most on Instagram, users post videos, pictures, polls, questions and contest notifications on stories. That remains there for 24 hours and notifies followers about upcoming events or present situations that you need to know. Although it remains there for a specific time you can keep it on your profile for longer. Well, if you want to pin a comment on your story follows the below steps:

–          Go to your Instagram account

–          Click on the Instagram story

–          Add a comment that you want to pin

–          Swipe left on the comment

–          Click on Pin comment

How to Pin a Comment on Instagram Reel?

After the success of TikTok, Instagram updated its algorithm and added reels, that are short videos with engaging content. Some Instagram users looked to buy Instagram followers to grow their reach and engagement. Reels are great to keep your audience engaged and boost your marketing strategy, so if you pin your comment on a reel this would be more helpful to share your information or message.

Below are the steps to pin a comment on the Instagram reel:

  • Open your Instagram account
  •  Create an engaging reel
  •  Add your comment
  • Swipe left on your comment
  • Pin your comment

Facing Issues While Pinning Comments on Instagram Post?

As described earlier, you cannot pin your comment on Instagram posts but you can pin others’ comments. If you are facing any issues while pinning any comment on an Instagram post, find the solution below points:

  • Update your Instagram account
  • Re-launch your Instagram account
  •  Still, if an issue is there, clear the cache
  • Check your internet connection
  • Lastly, uninstall the app and then install it again.

How to Pin Post on Instagram?

Now you would have a better idea of how easily you can pin comments on your Instagram post, story, live session, and reel. If you are looking for easy ways to pin your Instagram post, below is the solution for you to pin 3 posts on your Instagram:

  • Open your Instagram app
  • Go to your profile
  • Select any post that you want to show on top of your profile
  • Click on three dots at the top right of your post
  • From the pop-up menu click on Pin
  • After your posts will remain at the top with a thumbtack icon

Also, read how to post on Instagram from PC to learn more Insta related tricks.

Final Words

Most users use this feature to show the post to other users that they want them to watch first on their profile. Even some users look for Instagram profile Viewers from reliable sources like Explore.IG to have a secret look at the profile of others. While some Instagram users pin comments or posts so that people should have a first on that specific comment or post. This helps in controlling cyberbullying and also appreciating people that posted something unique and positive.

title.rendered: Digital Video KYC – A Robust Solution for Onboarding Customers

content.rendered:
Businesses have undergone essential transformations over the past few years, with digitalization being the most important change. Taking advantage of the global market and reaping its benefits has prompted. Which approach is best for ensuring KYC/AML requirements are met while also enhancing the client experience? The video KYC option allows clients to be onboarded in real-time while also adapting to changing regulatory standards.

Conventional KYC vs Digital Video KYC

Know Your Customer (KYC) is a practice of verifying an individual’s identity and identifying any potential threats they may pose. Financial institutions and other businesses that deal with money are required to comply with AML regulations. The traditional method of verifying customer identities involves a physical customer identification mechanism. The procedure can take weeks, forcing customers to stop midway.

The video KYC is a better, simpler, and more affordable version of the conventional identity verification process. It eliminates paperwork in favor of meaningful results, accelerating the verification process as a whole. Customers are no longer required to visit the organizational office to open their accounts and present identification documents. One-click could complete the entire process. 

The Need of Video KYC Solution

Although video KYC verification is currently a hot topic, it is not an exaggeration to say that it is the market’s main driver of expansion. Video KYC validation is an ideal solution in this scenario since it makes the identification process more effective and cost-effective. As well as making the operations more efficient at a lower cost.

In today’s digital age, the threat of cybercrime has become a pressing concern for businesses, and video verification is a highly effective means of preventing scams. A variety of identity fraud are prevented by the video KYC of business clients, including:

Forged Identity

It is difficult to detect these counterfeits in the early stages of fraud, but video KYC verification technologies can now detect them quickly, preventing further fraud.

Spoof Attacks

As businesses are moving towards digital communication, con artists are getting better at using spoofing attacks to reveal their malicious motives. Intruders use fake or forged identities to trick and get around verification processes.

This type of document and face spoofing assault is challenging to identify. With the help of video KYC verification, which combines human and computer intelligence, spoofing attempts are quickly identified.

Deep Fakes

Motion pictures created by a deep learning algorithm are known as deep fakes. They are made with the intention of tricking technology and gaining access to personal information.

Using deep fakes in facial verification, fraudsters may be able to avoid identity checks. More robust video KYC verification is required because it’s hard to find any difference between these videos and real ones.

The Video KYC Service Checklist

The best AML solution for the business will only be selected after thoroughly researching its features and functionalities. While choosing video KYC for your business, keep in mind the following:

Coverage Range

Services are now readily accessible worldwide thanks to digitization. Therefore, pick a video KYC that offers worldwide coverage. Additionally, it supports various document formats and languages.

Cost-Efficient

A great user experience should be maintained while the KYC solution works to reduce the overall costs of the KYC process.

Corporate Security

It must handle the client’s private information with the utmost care to prevent identity theft or data breaches. This process can also be implemented on website security, whenever a customer makes a purchase online.

Omnichannel Engagement

In order to enhance the customer experience, omnichannel engagement and authentication should be provided. So, that customers can verify their identities without switching channels.

Customized Solution

The requirements of each company should be considered when designing a KYC because different industries have different standards.

In Summation

Businesses are working to enhance their online offerings in an effort to meet changing customer expectations and prosper in the digital era. Video KYC is thus a widely used technique in the verification market.

Utilizing this service will help businesses shorten KYC turnover time and streamline their hiring process. Video KYC verification is anticipated to be used in a wide range of industries. In fact, many businesses have already started using it for client onboarding. It assists organizations in ensuring fraud-free user onboarding when used in conjunction with a real online document verification solution.

title.rendered: ICR Services – Enhancing Business Efficiency in Digital World

content.rendered:
The ICR services are used extensively worldwide in multiple sectors for document scanning and manual data validation. In short, it’s a sophisticated addition to OCR that has specialized particular features. By integrating the handwriting of authorized employees, top management, or individuals who are in charge of data input and processing strategic planning, the technology basically empowers businesses. 

It recognizes numerous handwriting styles and font sizes to verify the integrity of forms, contracts, and different kinds of records. It operates more precisely and can detect even the tiniest similarity between writing styles. The technology is very useful for different sectors that involve a significant amount of paper-based work, such as surveying and gathering product details from the sample group on an individual basis.

How are ICR Services an Updated Version of OCR?

ICR (Intelligent Character Recognition) is a well-known type of Optical Character Character Recognition (OCR) whose primary goal is to recognize handwritten and printed characters. However, the ICR application is designed to accurately and quickly comprehend the language of complicated printed and handwritten records. This text recognition capability forms the core functionality of various document processing application hosting, including those used for data extraction and information retrieval. The ICR technology is skilled at removing text from photos; in other terms, it is a more sophisticated OCR algorithm. Because of this, the ICR software is constantly getting better, but it is still being updated to gain a standing for providing reliable results. It is undeniable that the ICR app has always been learning, and the more it’s used, the more precise result it will be able to provide. Additionally, the artificial intelligence algorithm and the self-learning feature of ICR technology are both used to interpret its capacity to upgrade writing styles and typefaces. This demonstrates that any new style or font that is scanned passes through an AI text recognition procedure and is stored in the database.

How ICR Services Work

ICR  is incorporated into the system that accepts input from the written text. It obtains information from the files after scanning the content there. Let’s examine how ICR technology functions in the banks for the verification of documents digitally.

  1. The end-user should show their ID card to the camera. Details like name, DoB, etc. from the identity card will be extracted using ICR services after it has been scanned.
  2. In accordance with the instructions provided by the system, the user can also be asked to submit written consent. It will scan and retrieve the consent text.
  3. Data and findings from the verification of the extracted data would be forwarded to the bank.

The business overhead associated with time-consuming and inefficient data entering operations is eliminated by the computerized data extraction procedure. Not only does it save time, but it also eliminates the need to pay staff to enter data. An advanced data flow system that could also assist organizations in ensuring predictive modeling over huge datasets can be employed with the extraction of information to further improve and optimize the system.

Benefits of ICR Services

OCR technology is improved by ICR services since it can comprehend different font and style types. It makes use of neural network models and artificial intelligence to help the system learn from its experience. Artificial neural networks help intelligent word recognition software, which extracts information from both organized and unstructured texts with computerized or cursive handwriting, improve and update its learning process each time new data is given to it. Day after day, they get a variety of forms from both the financial and healthcare sectors. The ICR algorithm offers a prompt and effective method of processing consumer data as a result. Additionally, the ICR technology lets them input massive amounts of information with minimum errors since there is no space for mistakes in some businesses. It also reduces time while extracting information from handwritten notes digitally. Thus, ICR is a great bet for all businesses whether it is a healthcare sector, eCommerce platform, or financial firm. 

Final Thoughts

Having learned what ICR is, it is crucial for businesses to know that the technology’s implementation is completely dependent on the needs of the particular firm. OCR, however, is more affordable than ICR services. But if the business processes enormous amounts of data on a regular basis, including both organized and unorganized documents, then combining ICR and OCR is a good step. This not only minimizes manual labor by end of the day but also produces results with high accuracy.

title.rendered: Boosting Your Sale with Custom Boxes

content.rendered:
The first impression lasts forever be it of persons or products. Better it is then to improve the first interaction. For products, not presenting them perfectly can cost you customers and your sale. Saying differently, the first impression of products (packaging) influences further decisions of customers. According to a recent report, almost 70% of people are of the view packaging boxes influence their purchasing decisions. Therefore, mandatory it is to put effort and money into bettering the look of your items. Without which, customers will not buy your products. Especially in today’s market where plenty of buying options are available, you will miss out on opportunities to advertise your brand and potential sale if you give a deaf ear to this significant factor.

In addition, boxes for products prove beneficial for your brand in multiple ways. By bettering the look of your products, they act like a magnet to pull the attention of customers. Upon getting these items in amazing containers, customers find it hard to ignore the appeal of these boxes. Moreover, marketing without which you cannot compete in this extremely tough competition reaches its peak when you use custom printing to communicate with your customers. More and more people become aware of your brand and this leads to more sales and revenue generation. Surely, there are different ways in which packaging can boost your sale.

Significance of Packaging for your Business

Do product boxes boost your sale? Absolutely. They play a vital role in expanding your revenue. Not only do they market your product, but also ensure brand awareness for your business. Surely the latter is a prerequisite for the uplift of your brand. For the sale to happen, a number of factors need to be synchronized. For example, a product must be delivered safely. It should look appealing to grab the attention of clients. It should expand the reach of your business by popularizing your product. A box of a product masterly does these above-mentioned functions.

Coming to the protection of items inside, the robust and durable material of these packaging boxes proves a shield against all odds and external factors that can damage the primary condition of items. From manufacturing to customer delivery, they do not let pressures, weight, and jerks deface what you order. Upon receiving goods in their original condition, customers build trust with your brand. On the other hand, they will not bring a second thought about buying your item if they received a damaged item in the first place. What you will have to do is either return the money or replace the product. Neither is good for building the trust of customers.

Among thousands of brands and products available in the market, finding your brand becomes difficult for customers. What it necessitates is to help people recognize your products. Here again, containers come to your rescue. With enough information through images, text, and other ways of communication, clients easily identify your goods in addition to remembering them for a long time. They create a familiarity with what you sell. This familiarity is the first step in building a bond of trust with your clients. In addition to this, logos, fonts, and graphics of different colors help customers remember your product. What is more, printing improves business awareness. No doubt, boxes of your products offer a huge brand awareness opportunity. These benefits directly or indirectly help boost your sale.

How an Increase in Sales is Possible?

Using containers for your products is not necessary from a functionality standpoint but also from sales and marketing. Seven out of ten shoppers believe packaging drives their decision of purchase. In the plethora of options that are available to customers, the main factor in their decision-making is how the product apparently looks. Products with an ordinary look never succeed in grabbing their attention. Since beauty has been a weakness of humans from the very beginning, items with captivating boxes create an unmatched aura for themselves. Regardless of how many goods are lying in the market, they become as noticeable as an island in the ocean. All credit goes to these boxes that bless your product with an amazing look.

Moreover, options of custom boxes are also helpful in boosting your sale. Customization means you can alter the size, shape, dimensions, and style of your containers according to your needs. What is more, your item gets an exclusive and unique look due to customization. The uniqueness compels customers to examine it and buy it. Due to this reason, most brands prefer to use a custom box for their items.

Product Quality Becomes Apparent

Items with premium quality are always a prioritized choice of people. Its quality is better manifested by what it is wrapped in. The quality, integrity, and legitimacy of your brand are told by its wrapping. You can translate this notion into a purchase by giving a premium quality to your containers. This is an easy and effective way of attracting more and more customers. Suppose packaging is of high-quality, customers produce a notion about your item that it is of good quality. Doing this proves a great trust-builder especially when you are alluring those people who have never used your brand. On the other hand, of what use are simple, plain bags? In no way, they can cement the trust of clients since trust is the first step that leads to purchase. Therefore, always use a well-built packaging box for your items if you really want to increase your sale and revenue. It can be cardboard packaging or any other material, suited to the product it contains, make sure it is robust and looks good also.

Pen off

In short, a box truly supplements your sale in multiple ways. Not only does it maximize the appeal of your product but also creates a distinct brand image that helps people remember your brand for a long time. Thinking otherwise can be a huge error that can cost you a sale. However, things become clear like daylight when you analyze how containers boost your sale. Particularly, the role of custom boxes is hard to ignore given their importance for creating an excellent look for your goods. If you want to make your product a brand, no better option is available than using customized packaging.
